issue.title: [Rust] Remove macro definition for ListArrayBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3939](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3939). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently `ListArrayBuilder` is done using macro and only implemented for a few value builder types. We should lift this restriction and allow creation of list builders with arbitrary value builder types.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3939?focusedCommentId=16710322) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3100
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3100>
